data.message: Hey , Facebook,  what happened to the notifications on the app settings , like the ringtones  ?? Did you take that off ??

replies.message: Hi Ellen. You can learn how to set your mobile notification settings using the following link: http://bit.ly/2vdVlOS. Hope this helps! -Ashley

I don't think you understood what i meant,  when i go there the notification settings are not there and i can't select a ringtone for my Facebook. I was going to send you a snapshot of it , but it looks like i can't even do that on your pages
